titleStmt.title: The wheel of time turning round to the good old vvay; or, The good old cause vindicated.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Tis you who did defend the Good Old Cause,".
Dated at end in MS.: March. 24. 1661.
Signed: Written by a Lover of the Good Old Cause, who expects a time of redemption from his present captivity.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
